title: $262,000,000,000 Exits JPMorgan, Wells Fargo, BofA and Citi in One Year As Government Reveals Collapse of Another US Bank
description:
America’s biggest banks are witnessing a contraction of customer deposits as another regional bank is forced to close its doors. The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) says Heartland Tri-State Bank of Elkhart, Kansas, failed on July 28th. All customer deposits have been transferred to Dream First Bank, National Association (N.A.), also based in Kansas. The […]

The post $262,000,000,000 Exits JPMorgan, Wells Fargo, BofA and Citi in One Year As Government Reveals Collapse of Another US Bank appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

title: Ethereum Competitor Avalanche Sees Surge in Daily Transactions and Active Addresses in Second Quarter: Nansen
description:
Ethereum (ETH) competitor Avalance (AVAX) witnessed an uptick in on-chain activity in the second quarter of 2023, according to the crypto data firm Nansen. Avalanche’s C-Chain, the project’s default smart contract blockchain, saw between 200,000-550,000 daily transactions throughout the second quarter. According to the analytics firm, the figures representÂ nearly double the volume of daily transactions […]

The post Ethereum Competitor Avalanche Sees Surge in Daily Transactions and Active Addresses in Second Quarter: Nansen appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
